original_title: The Jacksons Live At Toronto 1984 - Victory Tour
overview: The Victory Tour was a concert tour of the United States and Canada by The Jacksons between July and December 1984. It was the first and only tour with all six Jackson brothers (even though Jackie was injured for most of the tour). The group performed 55 concerts to an audience of approximately 2 million. Most came to see Michael Jackson, whose album Thriller was dominating the popular music world at the time.
title: The Jacksons Live At Toronto 1984 - Victory Tour
